First Quantum seeks $20 billion over Panama mine closure orderCanadian miner First Quantum Minerals said on Wednesday it was seeking $20 billion through international arbitration after Panama ordered the closure of the company's flagship copper mine in the central American nation. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 14:50:50 GMT AV6IEXTVEVMWRPJHHXMNQUAF5Y https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/first-quantum-says-it-is-seeking-20-billion-over-panama-mine-closure-order-2024-02-21/Divya Rajagopal市场商品
Ronaldo strikes as Al-Nassr confirm Asian Champions League progressCristiano Ronaldo's Al-Nassr advanced to the quarter-finals of the Asian Champions League on Wednesday as the Riyadh-based side beat fellow Saudi Pro League outfit Al-Fayha 2-0 to complete a 3-0 aggregate victory. World Trade Organization's push for reform plagued by obstaclesDays before talks that could decide its future role in setting the rules for global commerce in an era of rising protectionism, the World Trade Organization is snagged on what to do with its "non-meetings". Wed, 21 Feb 2024 13:13:49 GMT VVLJMVJTPVM5VKTXR6VYTMRGWU https://www.reuters.com/business/world-trade-organizations-push-reform-plagued-by-obstacles-2024-02-21/Emma Farge商业
Exclusive: US targets China's top chipmaking plant after Huawei Mate 60 ProThe Biden administration is turning up the heat on China's top sanctioned chipmaker by cutting off its most advanced factory from more American imports after it produced a sophisticated chip for Huawei's Mate 60 Pro phone, three people familiar with the matter said. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 12:09:37 GMT ZY43V233W5K7DN626TYIUJL24Q https://www.reuters.com/technology/us-targets-chinas-top-chipmaking-plant-after-huawei-mate-60-pro-sources-say-2024-02-21/Alexandra Alper, Karen Freifeld技术
With Currys buyout, China's JD.com could get hungered short-cut to Europe expansionIf JD.com does acquire British electronics retailer Currys , the Chinese ecommerce giant JD.com would get the store and warehouse network it needs to expand rapidly in the UK and Europe, at a bargain-basement price.
